item.dc:creator: @Itz_Alister_Yo Itz Alister Yo
item.description:
@Itz_Alister_Yo wrote:

[quote=“iamlies, post:22, topic:435076”][quote author=Itz Alister Yo link=topic=537795.msg3951322#msg3951322 date=1332299285]
I get this error when I try to run my server

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:377) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:34) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:62) Press any key to continue . . .
[/quote]

Why is it in ItemHandler?[/quote] I dunno, I didnt event mess with it.

item.title: [PI] Adding the Zaryte bow! Ints and models here!
item.dc:creator: @omg_dubzy omg dubzy
item.description:
@omg_dubzy wrote:

[quote=“iamlies, post:19, topic:435076”]I could help you over teamveiwer if you want? Or just search for: if (itemDef.certTemplateID != -1) itemDef.toNote(); if (itemDef.lentItemID != -1) itemDef.toLend(); if (!isMembers && itemDef.membersObject) { itemDef.name = "Members Object"; itemDef.description = "Login to a members' server to use this object."; itemDef.groundActions = null; itemDef.itemActions = null; itemDef.team = 0; } then add the ints under there.

edit, pm me if it doesnt work with your pass and name thing.[/quote]

I don’t have Teamviewer… and i’ll try it now, if it doesn’t work add me on skype?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Adding the Zaryte bow! Ints and models here!

item.title: [PI] Adding the Zaryte bow! Ints and models here!
item.dc:creator: @iamlies iamlies
item.description:
@iamlies wrote:

I could help you over teamveiwer if you want? Or just search for: if (itemDef.certTemplateID != -1) itemDef.toNote(); if (itemDef.lentItemID != -1) itemDef.toLend(); if (!isMembers && itemDef.membersObject) { itemDef.name = "Members Object"; itemDef.description = "Login to a members' server to use this object."; itemDef.groundActions = null; itemDef.itemActions = null; itemDef.team = 0; } then add the ints under there.

edit, pm me if it doesnt work with your pass and name thing.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding the Zaryte bow! Ints and models here!
item.dc:creator: @omg_dubzy omg dubzy
item.description:
@omg_dubzy wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:15, topic:435076”]Try using these instead:

case ####: class8.modelid = 62692; class8.aString170 = "Zaryte bow"; class8.description = "A powerful magic based bow."; class8.anInt181 = 1703; class8.modelRotationY = 221; class8.modelRotationX = 404; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = -13; class8.anInt165 = 62750; class8.anInt200 = 62750; class8.groundActions = new String[5]; class8.groundActions[2] = "Take"; class8.itemActions = new String[5]; class8.itemActions[1] = "Wield"; class8.itemActions[2] = "Check-charges"; class8.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; break;[/quote]

Still have errors. Would you like me to post them two?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding the Zaryte bow! Ints and models here!
item.dc:creator: @iamlies iamlies
item.description:
@iamlies wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:9, topic:435076”]Haha …well small details make the large ones you know?

When I first read the title I thought “finally somebody will explain the different variables in the int for a model” then I saw what you did and was like not a tutorial at all I already know how to add a model.[/quote]

This is a models section… If I was adding a tutorial for ints then I would post there. This was to help the community and my first post yet you have decided to criticize it. I changed the title yet you still carry on. Some encouragement to the community would be well placed considering the reputation moparscape already has…

Read full topic
